Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2011 05:35PM mungie wrote: had thoracentesis done 4 times, first was not bad, each time got a little more painful, definitely have someone drive, and get a good pain medication for afterwards....  let me know how you do
Posts.Title: What should I expect from draining effusion? PJB mungie

Posts.Content: May 18, 2011 11:16AM mungie wrote: i was dx'd with a malignant pleural effusion back in january, have had 4 thoradentesis' with a total of 4 liters extracted and have told only my closest friends and bosses (I am an ER nurse), but now must go on IV chemo where i will loose my hair (again) so i am slowly telling everyone, i just didn't want to be treated any differently , ya know?  good luck to you
Posts.Title: how many people have you told apple blondiex46
